title: Battery Why is Battery of Pixel 3a swollen and made a crack on the rear panel.How can I resolve this
content:
I have purchased Pixel 3a Oct'19(11 months back) and now I have seen a crack on my battery rear panel. Is it due to battery buldge or Note sure Why this happened, I am worried whether this is an Alarming issue? and whom should I reach out to.
Is it safe/suggestible to use this mobile in this condition? How can I replace this.What will be the process to do so?
Kindly please help out
